subject: [Reform] If I get the chance.
body:
A modeless dialog box lets you change input focus 
to other window.
All the oceans, near and far, We have searched and 
ploughed-but we Of that ring no sign could see.
All the outside walls are floor-to-ceiling glass.
So it was not exactly as if I were setting up a bluff.
This sample demonstrates the use of the CRM 
monitoring interfaces.
This expansion operator forces an immediate 
evaluation of the following expression and then it converts the result of the 
expression into a string of digits.
Scrollbar itself can be a window, if it = is 
created as a child control of a view.
Another few minutes and they would have caught me, 
but a horn sounded and they turned their horses and galloped off. There ain't no 
bis'ness done, you see.
